alert.note: Alert for Southwest Highlands (Idaho) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Boise (Southwestern Idaho and Eastern Oregon)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 23 at 7:29PM MDT by NWS Boise
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Owyhee County through 800 PM MDT... At 729 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Bruneau River Launch Site, or 33 miles north of Jarbidge, moving east at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Clover Butte and Middle Butte around 750 PM MDT. Juniper Ranch, Clover Creek Crossing and Juniper Butte around 800 PM MDT. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
